## Gene Details:

- **Description:**   CBL-interacting protein kinase 1;(source:Araport11)

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS9889]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;sensitive to osmotic stress and high concentrations of ABA; ABA hypersensitive germination; sensitivity decreases with seed storage; seeds take longer to after-ripen; impaired root growth
   - [CS9890]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;sensitive to salt treatment; ABA hypersensitive germination; sensitivity decreases with seed storage; seeds take longer to after-ripen; impaired root growth
